UQ Testing - Potable Water - 1500kpa water test (not an air test)
template name: UQ Testing - Potable Water - 1500kpa water test (not an air test)

name: Is there existing work by previous plumbing contractor within workfront? (Pass = Yes)
Photos of prior works BEFORE RSG commencement must be included here
Water test is being conducted on material that is rated to withstand 1500kpa
All valves dedicated to isolating the test zone have been securely shut off & tagged
Air purging valve point has been nominated
Pressure testing valve point has been nominated (if none at meter manifold)
Ensure isolating valves within the test zone are open as required
All terminal open ends i.e. lugged elbows, etc are securely capped off
All in-wall mixer assemblies & pressure sensitive meters, etc have been isolated/removed from the test zone (these items are only rated to max 500kpa)
Feeder valve was slowly opened & the test zone has filled with water until completely purged of any air
Electric pressure testing pump device was connected to the nominated test point
Electric pressure testing pump is calibrated
Test consisted of slowly increasing the pressure to 1500kpa with the water feed shut off and the pressure held for not less than 30mins
Pressure in the testing area was slowly reduced back to neutral working conditions
Pressure reading photos must be taken at start & finish of test. Add in comments (test duration etc)
UQ Testing - Potable Water - 900kpa water test pressure sensitive valves (not an air test)
template name: UQ Testing - Potable Water - 900kpa water test pressure sensitive valves (not an air test)

name: Is there existing work by previous plumbing contractor within workfront? (Pass = Yes)
Photos of prior works BEFORE RSG commencement must be included here
Water test is being conducted on material that is rated to withstand only 1000kpa
All valves dedicated to isolating the test zone have been securely shut off & tagged
Air purging valve point has been nominated
Pressure testing valve point has been nominated (if none at meter manifold)
Ensure isolating valves within the test zone are open as required
All terminal open ends i.e. lugged elbows, etc are securely capped off
All in-wall mixer assemblies & pressure sensitive meters, etc have been isolated/removed from the test zone (these items are only rated to max 500kpa)
Feeder valve was slowly opened & the test zone has filled with water until completely purged of any air
Electric pressure testing pump device was connected to the nominated test point
Electric pressure testing pump is calibrated
Test consisted of slowly increasing the pressure to 900kpa with the water feed shut off and the pressure held for not less than 30mins
Pressure in the testing area was slowly reduced back to neutral working conditions
Pressure reading photos must be taken at start & finish of test. Add in comments (test duration etc)
UQ Testing - Natural Gas
template name: UQ Testing - Natural Gas

name: Is there existing work by previous plumbing contractor within workfront? (Pass = Yes)
Photos of prior works BEFORE RSG commencement must be included here
Water test is being conducted on material that is rated to withstand only 1000kpa
All valves dedicated to isolating the test zone have been securely shut off & tagged
Air purging valve point has been nominated
Pressure testing valve point has been nominated
Ensure isolating valves within the test zone are open as required
All terminal open ends are securely capped off
Feeder valve was slowly opened & the test zone has filled with air until completely purged
Pressure testing device was connected to the nominated test point
Pressure testing device is calibrated
For high pressure test: Test consisted of slowly increasing pressure to 1.5 kPa above working pressure
For low pressure test: Test consisted of slowly increasing pressure no greater than 7 kPa
Testing was deemed successful if the pressure remains unchanged for 5 mins of every 30 litres volume of pipe
Pressure in the testing area was slowly reduced back to neutral working conditions
Pressure reading photos must be taken at start & finish of test. Add in comments (test duration etc)
UQ Testing - Air Test - Sewer & Stormwater Underslung
template name: UQ Testing - Air Test - Sewer & Stormwater Underslung

name: Is there existing work by previous plumbing contractor within workfront? (Pass = Yes)
Photos of prior works BEFORE RSG commencement must be included here
Pipe has been checked and is clear of blockage
Pipe work is securely clipped and ready for test
Open ends have been sealed
Temporary valved test point with union fitting was used
Pressure testing device connected to temporary valve point
Test consisted of slowly increasing pressure to 30 kPa
Pressurization was discontinued to allow system to stabilise over 3 minutes
Testing was deemed successful if the pressure drop of less than or equal to 5 kPa over at least 30mins
